title: An idea of a champion that i came up with (DO NOT BULLY IT MIGHT NOT BE GOOD)
body:
Note: stuff in **()** can be changed other than that are stuff that i would prefer to stay but they also might get changed

I was thinking of a very squishy champ that can summon minions that last a long time that attack for him
i got inspired from heimerdinger and azir quite a bit but trust me he is different

Passive - You cannot use basic attacks clicking on a target makes following minions attack your target click on yourself to call them back and **(when you get damaged you get a (+50%) movement speed)**

Q - Summon
charge for **(1 second)** to summon a minion that Follows you and attacks for you and has (**%50**) of your stats you can summon up to **(6 minions)**
**(20 seconds cooldown)**

W- Stay here!
You command one of your minions to stay at a position for **(1 minute)** attacking anything that gets nearby and comes back to you after the period "like maokai's pets except they don't explode..."
**(10 seconds cooldown)**

E- Rush!
**(All minions get (50%) more attack speed and (100%) more movement speed for (6 seconds)
(20 seconds cooldown))**

R- Call back
Channel for **(5 seconds)** calling back all minions to rush to your position very quickly attacking any champion in their path

as i said anything can be changed the keys of abbilitys might change what the abbility does can change cooldowns and time can change you can just scrap the idea and like "this champ wont work" after all its just an idea >_O

its an interesting concept!
 
i think relying solely on minions with no abilities of your own is a little narrow though. 


I know Malzahar, Heimerdinger, and Azir were mentioned, but what I thought of was Zyra. She can basically summon minions with her abilities that determine whether they are melee or ranged, and her ult empowers them. 

Since your champ is based entirely on leading minions, i like the idea of having different types of minions, tank v damage. i think it makes most sense for it to be decided upon spawn what they will be, but i don't know how that would work. 

The abilities you have so far consist of summon, stay, empower, and come. 

Taken from Zyra, i would combine the summon/stay command. Plant something, and than use the ability again to summon them. The planted minions also activate when you R and come to you. I would say that the R would kinda work like Syndra's R, just a mass running towards you? But if the ult's number of minions go over your allotment, the extra would die soon after reaching their destination. 

Your R seems like the only thing close to a defensive ability, and since you said the champion is very squishy, could become frustrating very quickly. 

I think the E is fine as an empowerment ability, gives you a little bit of an edge. I would use the freed up ability as some sort of shield/dash/escape/heal.

Thank you for your support but im only giving a main idea with abbilitys to help make others understand how this champ will work. So you dont have to take everything from here and put it ingame. Its just a main idea not a finished champ. Hope you understand
And about the defence for this guy: he is supposed to be very squichy and weak alone thats why he needs minions with him and around him so if he is walking alone he is basicly helpless
